description:
WE HAVE NEVER SEEN EQUALITY IN MEDICINAL FIELD.
OUR MONEY IS GREEN BUT AS LONG AS OUR BODIES ARE MELANIN THEY DONT SEE US AS PEOPLE. 
They have used medicine as a way to CONTROL BLACK PEOPLE FOR GENERATIONS. They have never seen us as human. We are their test animals. Getting rich off our pain all while killing us. That mindset has helped them to no see out pain. For years you have heard the stories. You may even have felt the pain or their lack of action. People being  misdiagnosed and just out right denied the care they need. Its a story so many of us have told on deaf ears. 
We need our own doctors, nurses and scientist. We need #BlackRepresentation #BlackDoctors #BlackNurses #BlackScientist 
#POPULATIONCONTROL 
#corona  #coronavirus  #COVID19 #Shutdown #Martiallaw #quarantine  #pandemic #5G #Vaccination
#Coronachallege #coronamemes
